name: VIDEO_SOURCE_VIDEO_PUBLISH_STATE_CHANGED
description: Occurs when the video publishing state changes.The callback for the second instance.

parameters.oldState: The previous publishing state, see STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE for details.

parameters.newState: The current publishing state, see STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE for details.

parameters.elapseSinceLastState: The time elapsed (ms) from the previous state to the current state.
